summary: I DROVE A MAZDA MILLENIA.  IF THERE IS ANY QUESTION OF THE INTEGRITY OF THIS  VEHICLE, TALK TO ME!  THIS CAR HELD TOGETHER AND SAVED MY LIFE AFTER A VERY   BAD ACCIDENT WHERE I WAS HIT TWICE,SPUN AND HIT A CONCRETE POST!  THIS IS   A MIRACLE AND I AM A BELIEVER! BAD VALENTINES DAY, GREAT CAR!  THIS IS NOT   A COMPLAINT, BUT I DIDNT KNOW WHERE TO SUBMIT A GREAT COMPLIMENT!  I HAVE NO DOUBT THAT THIS CAR DID SAVE MY LIFE.
